TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Quaternion extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Numerics.Quaternion>
Public Structure Quaternion Implements IEquatable(Of Quaternion)

summary.span: 表示一个用于对三维物理旋转进行编码的向量。

span.span: Represents a vector that is used to encode three-dimensional physical rotations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构用于有效地旋转对象 （x，y，z） 有关向量的角度 theta，其中：The structure is used to efficiently rotate an object about the (x,y,z) vector by the angle theta, where: ``` w = cos(theta/2) ```

summary.span: 创建一个新的 对象。

span.span: Creates a new object.

summary.span: 返回表示此四元数的字符串。

span.span: Returns a string that represents this quaternion.

returns.span: 此四元数的字符串表示形式。

span.span: The string representation of this quaternion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回字符串中的数字值设置格式的使用当前区域性的约定。The numeric values in the returned string are formatted by using the conventions of the current culture. 例如，对于 EN-US 区域性，则返回的字符串可能显示为`{X:1.1 Y:2.2 Z:3.3 W:4.4}`。For example, for the en-US culture, the returned string might appear as `{X:1.1 Y:2.2 Z:3.3 W:4.4}`.
